Name: The Law Knows No Kindness
Effect: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

Name: Right of Final Interpretation
Effect: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

Name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
Effect: Increases the Level of Signed Edict by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Name: Supreme Amnesty
Effect: When Done Deal is used:Creates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.This shield absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively.

Name: Abiding Affidavit
Effect: Increases the Level of Done Deal by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Name: Extra Clause
Effect: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.
